title: Riot IFS bugs out and falsely punish me! I demand answers! Punished for saying two characters: "9x"!
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/61f325da1ea31f5909464b2d5e1ff251.png

This is so frustrating! The system freaking bugged out and now I am the one who has to deal with the consequences! If your system isn't reliable and is prone to errors, then maybe it shouldn't be the single authority that punishes accounts. This is absurd, I didn't do anything wrong! Riot, fix this now!

replies.body:
Hey there,

You were informed previously to hit up [Support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com) or message them on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport). You've also been unwilling to show your first game, which is typically the more severe of your games.

Since you've been unwilling to discuss game 1, and you've already been told to go to support, this board has done all it can to assist you.

Edit: I'll also point out that asking for reports *can* contribute to a punishment, as doing such is at best, unnecessary. This is elaborated on further here:  2nd Bullet point under "Things to avoid": https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884#h2q1

As such, I'm locking this thread.

If you have any questions about this moderation action, don't hesitate to reach out to the Boards Moderation Team via:

* The [**NA Boards Discord**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification)
* The [**Discuss the Boards**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) sub-board

[This isn't the first time you've tried this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/EKKbpial-umm-excuse-me-riot-25-game-chat-restriction-for-simply-saying-9x-ifs-working-as-intended), and this also isn't the first time you've fooled nobody.

In point of fact, this looks like exactly the same screenshot from your first thread.

If you're not going to show the Game 1 logs, you're not going to get anywhere. We can visibly see you were punished for two matches. We _know_ you got punished for more than just saying "9x". The IFS isn't bugged, you're just not showing all of your chat logs, and that's just disingenuous posting.

So .. it sounds like you don't fully understand how the system works, and sounds like you are under the assumption that you are only judged on those two games alone. 

The reform card only shows you _***~~recent games~~***_   as examples of unacceptable behavior,  doesn't mean you were punished for 2 games alone. Riot has found that showing games past recent memory is not an effective tool for players to understand their faults, as they just start saying things like "this wasn't me, I never act this way".

The system punishes based on consistency x severity, meaning you can be punished for 1 game of extreme toxicity or many many games of mild toxicity. 

Saying 9x is considered a valid report, as you are threatening other's account, which means it is a harassment.  It may be mild, but it still adds to you behavioral history. 

Since this punishment happened 30 days ago, I don't know if Riot support will still have the information,  but you can ask them how many games were considered in your punishment. If not, you can at least ask them how many games you were recently validly reported.
I'm going to need you to stop with all the moaning and provide that game 1 chat log, whenever you get a chance.
Yes, calling for reports on other players in such a negative, combative way is not appropriate, and your first game log was part of your punishment too.
To be honest the whole thread should be closed as you, OP, refuse to show us the needed information and can't have a single comment without screaming at other players.
